ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Inventory.Trinket

Class TrinketDetailsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Inventory.Trinket.TrinketDetailsActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class TrinketDetailsActivity
extends Activity
implements java.util.Observer
    Android activity for displaying the details of a trinket. Some of the trinkets details are displayed statically, and there are buttons that allow you to delete the trinket or edit its details with the AddOrEditTrinketActivity. If the trinket has photos attached to it those will be displayed, too.

      • deleteClick

        public void deleteClick(View view)
        Method called when the "Delete" button is clicked. This button allows the trinket currently being displayed to be deleted from the user's inventory. When the button is clicked a dialog is displayed prompting the user to confirm the deletion.
        Parameters:
        view - - the button that was clicked

      • getDialog

        public AlertDialog getDialog()

      • editClick

        public void editClick(View view)
        Method called with the "Edit Trinket" button is clicked. Directs the activity's controller to switch the user to the AddOrEditTrinketActivity.
        Parameters:
        view - - the button that was clicked
